CustomField.description: Contains field whose value will be shown on timecard UI milestone drop down list. If these are missing/null, the TC UI just continues to show the Milestone name fields of the available Milestones in the drop-down list. No lookup __r references are supported, only fields directly on the Milestone can be used.

CustomField.label: Show Milestone As Field
